entry.title: Leapsight/bondy
entry.summary: Bondy is an open source, always-on and scalable application networking platform for modern architectures. It is an all-in-one event and service mesh that offers both Publish-Subscribe (PubSub) and routed Remote Procedure Calls (RPC). Bondy implements the open Web Application Messaging Protocol (WAMP) and is written in Erlang.
